member.name: T:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.SandcastleBuilderConsole
member.summary: This is the console mode version of the Sandcastle Help File Builder.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.SandcastleBuilderConsole.Main(System.String[])
member.param: The command line arguments. This should be a list of projects to build and an optional "/v" option to provide verbose output.
member.returns: Zero on success, non-zero on failure

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.SandcastleBuilderConsole.LoadResponseFile(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.OptionInfo})
member.summary: Load settings from a response file.
member.param: The option list to which the content is added.
member.remarks: Nested response files are supported. Blank lines and lines starting with '#' (comments) are ignored.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.SandcastleBuilderConsole.AddAssemblyWildCard(System.String,SandcastleBuilder.Utils.SandcastleProject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This is called to add multiple assemblies and/or comments files to a project for documenting.
member.param: The project to which they are added.
True if adding comments only, false if adding assembly/comments file pairs.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.SandcastleBuilderConsole.AddApiFilter(SandcastleBuilder.Utils.SandcastleProject,SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.OptionInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This is used to add an ApiFilter entry.
member.param: The current project to which the API filter entries are added
True if it is an include entry or false if it is an exclude entry.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.SandcastleBuilderConsole.ShowHelp(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This is used to show the command line syntax
member.param: True to attempt to launch the help file open to the Console Mode Builder information topic or false to just show the command line help.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.SandcastleBuilderConsole.BuildProject(SandcastleBuilder.Utils.SandcastleProject)
member.summary: This is called to build a project
member.returns: Returns true if successful, false if not

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.SandcastleBuilderConsole.buildProcess_BuildStepChanged(System.Object,SandcastleBuilder.Utils.BuildProgressEventArgs)
member.summary: This is called by the build process thread to update the application with the current build step.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.SandcastleBuilderConsole.buildProcess_BuildProgress(System.Object,SandcastleBuilder.Utils.BuildProgressEventArgs)
member.summary: This is called by the build process thread to update the application with information about progress.

member.name: T:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.OptionInfo
member.summary: This class holds command line option information.

member.name: P:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.OptionInfo.OptionText
member.summary: Get the option text as specified

member.name: P:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.OptionInfo.SecondValue
member.summary: Get the second option value if there was one

member.name: P:SandcastleBuilder.ConsoleMode.OptionInfo.ThirdValue
member.summary: Get the third option value if there was one
